snippet.title: Brain Show - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Nintendo Switch and PC on June 7, 2023.

Welcome to the Brain Show! Mix of competition and integration activities where you choose your categories, answer questions, eliminate rivals and prove to the world that you are the smartest!

Perfect for parties, family reunions or just hanging out with friends! The Brain Show is a trivia game with almost 4,000 questions in 38 different categories, where you can put your knowledge to the test in 13 fun competitions.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2235150/Brain_Show

Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/brain-show-switch

Join us on:
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/SimplicityGames/

Discord:
https://discord.gg/jQzNZNtNhw
